title: How to Wake Your Boyfriend Up through Text

steps.title: Send a short note of gratitude so he knows he’s valued.
steps.content: Send a short note of gratitude so he knows he’s valued. A quick, heartwarming text will make his morning hustle so much easier. [1] X Research source “Another morning that you’re mine! 🥰” “Hey, honey! You’re the best part of my day.” “As soon as I get out of bed, I think of you.”

steps.title: Say you can hardly believe he’s real and boost his ego.
steps.content: Say you can hardly believe he’s real and boost his ego. For a cute good morning text for your boyfriend, make sure to compliment him. Praise goes a long way, and it will probably stay on his mind all day. “Are you really my boyfriend? Pinch me! 🤯” “You check off every box of mine! ✅✅ You’re perfect.” “Sweetheart, you take my breath away today and every day!”

steps.title: Tell him he always lifts your mood and that he enhances your life.
steps.content: Tell him he always lifts your mood and that he enhances your life. He’ll instantly imagine all the influence he has and love that he adds a spark to your life. “I can never be down when I have you to bring me up!” “You’re my angel! I’m always on cloud nine with you!” “Who needs holidays when you’re my gift all year? 🎁”

steps.title: Confess you’re growing fonder of him and make him swoon.
steps.content: Confess you’re growing fonder of him and make him swoon. You’ll give him a ton of reassurance when he learns your passion is only bound to grow stronger. [2] X Research source “I get more smitten with each and every minute! 🕐” “Morning! Ready for another chapter of our love story?” “With each passing day, my heart opens up to you!”

steps.title: Support all his hard work and give him a shot of motivation.
steps.content: Support all his hard work and give him a shot of motivation. His daily grind will feel a whole lot more fun when he knows you’re a huge fan of his discipline. [3] X Research source [4] X Expert Source Imad Jbara Dating Coach Expert Interview. 5 November 2019. “You leave me in awe. You’re so inspiring, babe.” “You’re a superhero! 🦸🏾‍♂️ It’s amazing all that you can do.” “When I look into the future…I see how incredible you’ll be. 🔮” Admiration is one of the best ways to compliment a guy through text. [5] X Expert Source Imad Jbara Dating Coach Expert Interview. 5 November 2019.

steps.title: Remind him that you’re a team so he’s sure you have his back.
steps.content: Remind him that you’re a team so he’s sure you have his back. Instead of feeling like he’s going at it alone, he’ll think about how your relationship is where he’ll always get encouragement and entertainment. “Up and at 'em, partner in crime!” “What trouble are we gonna get into today?” “C’mon! Let’s work our magic! 🧙🧙‍♀️”

steps.title: Tease him and laugh about how hard it can be to start your day.
steps.content: Tease him and laugh about how hard it can be to start your day. Not everyone is a morning person—if both of you drag your feet getting out of bed, bond over your shared passion to sleep in! Your goofy good morning text will make him smile. “I swear, I’m such a zombie in the A.M. You bring me to life, though!” “Rawr! 🐯 I feel practically feral. Mornings are so hard, huh?!” “Waving a magic wand so you can get through your day! ✨”

steps.title: Tempt him to visit you on a lazy weekend or his day off.
steps.content: Tempt him to visit you on a lazy weekend or his day off. Gush about a great breakfast or a good time. You’ll butter him up and convince him to get up—in a sweet way, of course! “Get out of bed and into mine! We’ve got shows to binge-watch!” “Pop over to my place! I know you’ve got absolutely nothing to do!” “Come through! 🥺 I’m craving pancakes. 🥞😋”

steps.title: Goof off and make the challenge of waking up a joke.
steps.content: Goof off and make the challenge of waking up a joke. Playfully get on his case and stir him up. When you tell him he has to get started on his day ASAP, he’s way more likely to jump into action. “Dreaming of me? That’s sweet, but you really have to get up!” “Wish I was there to drag you out of bed? 😝 Stay strong and do it yourself!” “It’s your fave coach! Get up, do 10 jumping jacks, and seize the day!”

steps.title: Treat him to a flirty selfie to get him fired up.
steps.content: Treat him to a flirty selfie to get him fired up. Mix things up—if he’s used to a little seduction in the evening, send him some spice in the morning. You’ll perk him up and prove your relationship is always full of surprises. “Something steamy to start your day off right! 🔥” “I bet this’ll wake you up better than a shot of espresso.” “Rise and shine! This is for your eyes only, ‘kay?”

steps.title: Use a saucy text as an appetizer for what you have in store.
steps.content: Use a saucy text as an appetizer for what you have in store. Sometimes a guy just needs a little incentive to get through the day. Work him up and give him an evening to look forward to. He’ll love to wake up to your message and be thankful to end the day with you! “Eat a good breakfast, handsome! You’ll need it for what I have cooked up…” “You’re going to work way too hard today, so I’ll make sure you get a treat.” “Make sure you save some energy for me, alright? 😘”

steps.title: Tell him that you’re basically obsessed and still fantasize about him.
steps.content: Tell him that you’re basically obsessed and still fantasize about him. Your boyfriend probably wants to know that you place him on a pedestal even after all the time you’ve spent together. Make his heart race and tell him you’ll always crave him. [6] X Research source “As soon as I opened my eyes, all I could think of was you and last night…😳” “You’re so mouthwatering. You make it hard to focus on work!” “No fair! I still have the hugest crush on you. Can’t get you off my mind.”
